        public boolean parseJWT(java.lang.String jwt,
               java.lang.String CLIENT_SECRET)
        Sample method to validate and read the JWT
        Parameters:
        jwt - String containing the token
        CLIENT_SECRET - Secret to decript the token
        Returns:
        true if the jwt is correctly formed and false if there was any error.
